page.title: 18 MY WEEKEND
page.content:
{On Saturday I get dressed at 8.00 a.m.Then I have to clean my teeth.Then I have my breakfast. Then my brother Simon and I watch{ {"The Mighty Heroes"}on television.Then I go down my Nanna's. I always take{a video film}with me that we have taped from the T.V. I have my dinner then I come home and go on my{Commodore 16 computer. Then my friend comes up his Nanna's (who lives up on our circle) till 5.00 p.m.then I watch the tele. {On Sunday I go down my other Nanna's and come home for my dinner and then go{into the garden to play on my swing {or play football.}After tea I have a bath, watch the video until about 9.00p.m. and then I go to bed.
by {Martyn Paul Woolfall.
